text: Nagrama karagi'ma ruana maka vahe'mo'za antahi vagare'naze. Ana hu'neanagi mago vahemo'e hunora eno asunkura hunenanteno, nazeri hanavea oti'ne. Ra Anumzamoka'ma atrankeno eno nazeri havizama hia knazamofo agenkea ha' vahenimo'za nentahi'za, tusi muse hu'naze. Hagi Ra Anumzamoka'ma zamazeri haviza hugahue hunka'ma huvempama hu'nana kante antenka, ame hunka zamazeri haviza huo hu'za zamagra hu'naze.
